newsitem.title: FINLAND: KVAERNER MASA 1996 PROFIT RISES 36 PCT.
newsitem.headline: KVAERNER MASA 1996 PROFIT RISES 36 PCT.

text.p: Kvaerner Masa-Yards Inc, the Finnish shipbuilding subsidiary of Norwegian group Kvaerner A/S, said on Tuesday its 1996 profit after financial items was 800.7 million markka, up from 589.6 million in 1995.
Kvaerner Masa-Yards said in a statement it expected its 1997 profit to be roughly on par with 1996 and its net sales to fall slightly.
"This year's profit will be roughly equal to and net sales slightly lower than 1996 figures while the predictions for 1998 show a downtrend in both profits and net sales," Kvaerner Masa-Yards said.
Masa-Yards 1996 net sales were 6.4 billion markka, up from 3.6 billion in 1995, it said.
